INktProcessMemory Interface Reference

Exposes methods for accessing process memory. More...

import"DeviareCOM.idl";

Inherits INktObject.

Detailed Description

Exposes methods for accessing process memory.

Member Function Documentation

HRESULT INktProcessMemory::AllocMem ( [in] my_ssize_t  bytes,
[in] VARIANT_BOOL  executeFlag,
[out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pVal 
)

Allocate a block of memory in the remote process.

Parameters
bytesThe number of bytes to allocate.
executeFlagSet to TRUE to enable the execute bit (NX) on the memory page(s) containing the block.
[in,out]pValA pointer to receive the address of the allocated block.
Remarks
Use INktProcessMemory::FreeMem to free the allocated memory on the remote process.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer value is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if byte count is invalid.
E_ACCESSDENIED if this allocation operation is not allowed.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktProcessMemory::BuildParam ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in] BSTR  type,
[out, retval] INktParam **  ppParam 
)
HRESULT INktProcessMemory::ByteVal ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[out, retval] unsigned char *  pVal 
)
get

Read an unsigned byte value from the specified remote address.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address.
[in,out]pValPointer to receive requested value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the specified address could not be accessed.
E_POINTER of pVal pointer value is NULL.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktProcessMemory::ByteVal ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in] unsigned char  newValue 
)
set

Write an unsigned byte value to the specified remote address.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address.
newValueThe new value.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the specified address could not be accessed.
E_FAIL on general error.

HRESULT INktProcessMemory::FreeMem ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr)

Free a block of memory in the remote process.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address.
Remarks
Use INktProcessMemory::AllocMem to allocate memory block(s) on the remote process.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_ACCESSDENIED if this deallocation operation is not allowed, or the block was not requested with INktProcessMemory::AllocMem function.
E_FAIL on general error.
HRESULT INktProcessMemory::GetProtection ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_TRUE)] VARIANT_BOOL  allocated,
[out, retval] eNktProtection *  pVal 
)

Get the protection flags of a remote address.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address to query.
allocatedIf TRUE, the returned flags will match the protection flags when the memory region was initially allocated; otherwise, the current flags will be returned.
[in,out]pValPointer to a variable of type eNktProtection to receive protection flags.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the specified address could not be accessed.

HRESULT INktProcessMemory::Read ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in] eNktDboFundamentalType  type,
[out, retval] VARIANT *  pVal 
)

Read data from the remote process.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address.
typeThe type of the data to be read (member of eNktDboFundamentalType enumeration).
[in,out]pValA pointer to a variant to receive the requested data.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the specified address could not be accessed.
E_FAIL A general error has occurred.
HRESULT INktProcessMemory::ReadArray ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in] eNktDboFundamentalType  type,
[in] LONG  count,
[out, retval] VARIANT *  pVal 
)

Read an array of data from the remote process.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address.
typeThe type of the array elements to be read (member of eNktDboFundamentalType enumeration).
countThe number of elements to read.
[in,out]pValA pointer to a variant to receive the requested array.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the specified address could not be accessed.
E_INVALIDARG if count parameter is invalid.
E_FAIL A general error has occurred.
HRESULT INktProcessMemory::ReadMem ( [in] my_ssize_t  localAddr,
[in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in] my_ssize_t  bytes,
[out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pReaded 
)

Read a bulk of bytes from the remote process.

Parameters
localAddrThe local address.
remoteAddrThe remote address.
bytesThe number of bytes to read from the remote process.
[in,out]pReadedA pointer to receive the requested bytes.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the specified address could not be accessed.
NKT_DVERR_PartialCopy Not all the requested bytes could be read.
E_FAIL A general has occurred.
HRESULT INktProcessMemory::ReadString ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in] VARIANT_BOOL  isAnsi,
[out, retval] BSTR *  pVal 
)

Read an ANSI or Wide string from the remote process.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address to read.
isAnsiTRUE if string is to be read as ANSI; Unicode otherwise.
[in,out]pValPointer to store the read string.
Remarks
The function assumes the target string is NULL terminated.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the specified address could not be accessed.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer has insufficient space.
E_FAIL A general error has occurred.
HRESULT INktProcessMemory::ReadStringN ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in] VARIANT_BOOL  isAnsi,
[in] LONG  maxChars,
[out, retval] BSTR *  pVal 
)

Read an ANSI or Wide string from the remote process and specifying a maximum number of chars.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address.
isAnsiTRUE if string is to be read as ANSI; Unicode otherwise.
maxCharsThe character count to read.
[in,out]pValPointer to store the read string.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_INVALIDARG if maxChars is invalid.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the specified address could not be accessed.
E_OUTOFMEMORY if provided string buffer has insufficient space.
E_FAIL A general error has occurred.

HRESULT INktProcessMemory::StringLength ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in] VARIANT_BOOL  asAnsi,
[out, retval] LONG *  pVal 
)

Get the length in characters of an ansi/wide string in the remote process.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address.
asAnsiTRUE if string is to be read as ANSI; Unicode otherwise.
[in,out]pValPointer to receive the number of characters in string.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer value is NULL.
E_FAIL if the parameter type is non-string.

HRESULT INktProcessMemory::Write ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in] VARIANT  var 
)

Write data or array of data in the remote process.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address.
varThe variant to write.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the specified address could not be accessed.
NKT_DVERR_PartialCopy Not all the requested bytes could be written.
E_FAIL A general error has occurred.
HRESULT INktProcessMemory::WriteMem ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in] my_ssize_t  localAddr,
[in] my_ssize_t  bytes,
[out, retval] my_ssize_t *  pWritten 
)

Write a bulk of bytes in the remote process.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address.
localAddrThe local address.
bytesThe number of bytes to write to the remote process.
[in,out]pWrittenA pointer to the data to write.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if pointer argument is NULL.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the specified address could not be accessed.
NKT_DVERR_PartialCopy Not all the requested bytes could be written.
E_FAIL A general error has occurred.
HRESULT INktProcessMemory::WriteString ( [in] my_ssize_t  remoteAddr,
[in] BSTR  str,
[in] VARIANT_BOOL  asAnsi,
[in, defaultvalue(MY_VARIANT_TRUE)] VARIANT_BOOL  writeNul 
)

Write a string in the remote process.

Parameters
remoteAddrThe remote address.
strThe string to write.
asAnsiVARIANT_TRUE if str points to an ANSI string.
writeNulSpecify VARIANT_TRUE to write the NULL string terminator.
Returns
S_OK on success.
E_POINTER if provided string pointer is NULL.
E_ACCESSDENIED if the specified address could not be accessed.
E_FAIL A general error has occurred.
